metadata.title: CVE-2020-8910 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: A URL parsing issue in goog.uri of the Google Closure Library versions upto and including v20200224 allows an attacker to send malicious URLs to beparsed by the library and return the wrong authority. Mitigation: updateyour library to version v20200315.

criterions.comment: qtwebengine-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
